Package main

Class Background

java.lang.Object
main.Background
public class Background
extends java.lang.Object
Background class -Draws backgrounds of Crash Course Game.
Version:
- 2/21/22
Author:
- Mariah Bray, Dylan Howard, Thomas Jones

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void drawBackgroundCrash​(java.awt.Graphics view)
    A method to draw the games background when a crash has occurred.

  • Method Details

    • drawBackgroundGame

      public void drawBackgroundGame​(java.awt.Graphics view, boolean day)
      A method to draw the games background when it is being played.
      Parameters:
      view - A Graphics type object, this must be the same as the Graphics object used in all classes.

    • drawStartScreen

      public void drawStartScreen​(java.awt.Graphics view)
      A method to draw the games background when it has yet to be started.
      Parameters:
      view - A Graphics type object, this must be the same as the Graphics object used in all classes.

    • drawCloud

      public void drawCloud​(int x, int y, java.awt.Graphics view)
      A method to draw clouds for the games background.
      Parameters:
      x - An integer representing the cloud's X position on screen.
      y - An integer representing the cloud's Y position on screen.

    • drawStar

      public void drawStar​(int x, int y, java.awt.Graphics view)
      A method to draw stars for the games background.
      Parameters:
      x - An integer representing the star's X position on screen.
      y - An integer representing the star's Y position on screen.

    • drawStars

      public void drawStars​(int x, int y, java.awt.Graphics view)
      A method to draw clouds for the games background.
      Parameters:
      x - An integer representing the cloud's X position on screen.
      y - An integer representing the cloud's Y position on screen.

    • looperCloud

      public int looperCloud​(int l, int p)
      A method to allow clouds to loop back around once they have gone off-screen
      Parameters:
      l - An integer representing the cloud's X position on screen.
      p - An integer representing how many pixels the cloud is to move each loop.
      Returns:
      An integer representing the new X position of the cloud.

    • drawBackgroundCrash

      public void drawBackgroundCrash​(java.awt.Graphics view)
      A method to draw the games background when a crash has occurred.
      Parameters:
      view - A Graphics type object, this must be the same as the Graphics object used in all classes.

    • drawTextFinalCrash

      public void drawTextFinalCrash​(java.awt.Graphics view, int passed)
      A method to draw the games text when the final crash has occurred.
      Parameters:
      view - A Graphics type object, this must be the same as the Graphics object used in all classes.
      passed - An integer representing how many objects the player has passed.

    • drawTextCrash

      public void drawTextCrash​(java.awt.Graphics view, int lives)
      A method to draw the games text when a crash has occurred.
      Parameters:
      view - A Graphics type object, this must be the same as the Graphics object used in all classes.
      lives - An integer representing how many lives the player has left.

    • drawCarScreen

      public void drawCarScreen​(java.awt.Graphics view)
      A method to draw the vehicle choice screen background.
      Parameters:
      view - A Graphics type object, this must be the same as the Graphics object used in all classes.
      lives - An integer representing how many lives the player has left.
